items.sentence: It seems my field of vision is not as wide as it used to be.
Did you hear that a burglar broke into the neighbor's house?
The last time Tom talked to me was the day before yesterday.
I think that was one of the best movies that I've ever seen.
I want to make sure that we have enough time to finish this.
I haven't done any of the things that you've asked me to do.
You're going to have to do that sooner or later, aren't you?
You look happier today than you did the last time I saw you.
Tom is convinced that Mary is the one who stole his bicycle.
Tom is in a bad mood so it's best if you stay away from him.
